long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official V2 RevSend Extension for Google Chrome! 
Use this extension to integrate Amazon into the RevSend app. 

Steps:
1. Install this extension.
2. Navigate to Amazon sends in the RevSend webapp. 
3. Click "Send with Amazon". This will open a new tab and redirect to Amazon.com. 
4. Navigate to the item you want to send on Amazon.
5. Wait 5 seconds for the item page to fully load, then click the "Gift with Revsend" button. You will be redirect back to the RevSend app with the Amazon item information.
